thread.title: Compass Minerals Declares Third Quarter Dividend
thread.title_full: Compass Minerals Declares Third Quarter Dividend

title: Compass Minerals Declares Third Quarter Dividend
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Mon, Aug 3, 2015, 15:02 BST - UK Markets close in 1 hr 28 mins Compass Minerals Declares Third Quarter Dividend Press Release : Compass Minerals – 32 minutes ago -0.114 
OVERLAND PARK, Kan.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- 
Compass Minerals ( CMP ) board of directors has declared a cash dividend of $0.66 per share payable September 14, 2015, to shareholders of record at the close of business on August 31, 2015. 
About Compass Minerals 
Compass Minerals is a leading provider of essential minerals that provide solutions to nature’s challenges, including salt for winter roadway safety and other consumer, industrial and agricultural uses, and specialty plant nutrition minerals that improve the quality and yield of crops. The company produces its minerals at locations throughout the U.S. and Canada and in the U.K. For more information about Compass Minerals and its products, please visit www.compassminerals.com .
